thread.title: 'Trendy' Deepika Padukone feels Ranveer Singh embodies 'All about you'
thread.title_full: 'Trendy' Deepika Padukone feels Ranveer Singh embodies 'All about you' - newsR

author: newsr.in
title: 'Trendy' Deepika Padukone feels Ranveer Singh embodies 'All about you'
text: New Delhi, Oct 21 (ANI): Bollywood style icon Deepika Padukone , who recently launched her casual clothing line 'All about you' in the capital, said that the style statement of Ranveer Singh completely describes her brand. Talking about whose style she admires amongst her contemporaries, she said that she loves how Shahrukh Khan carries himself and Ranbir Kapoor has an interesting style. And when it comes to the ladies, she credits Sonam Kapoor and Kalki Koechlin for having an amazing and different style statement. Deepika would be seen sharing the screen space with Ranbir Kapoor in Imitiaz Ali's 'Tamasha' which is set to release on November 27 and in Sanjay Leela Bhansali directorial, 'Bajirao Mastani' which is slated to released on December 18.
